name: id
description: Trial registration number, either a ClinicalTrials.gov NCT id or DRKS id

name: registry
description: Trial registry, either ClinicalTrials.gov or DRKS

name: iv_version
description: IntoValue version, either 1 or 2.

name: identification_step
description: Manual publication search identification steps. Both versions include: No publ; Registry linked. Version 1 also includes: Pubmed; Hand search (= Publication found via Google search); Abstract only; Dissertation. Version 2 also includes: Publ found in Google ID search; Publ found in Google search (no ID). In version 2, abstracts only were not included, whereas dissertations were included.
levels: Abstract only; Dissertation; Hand search; No publ; Publ found in Google ID search; Publ found in Google search (no ID); Pubmed; Registry linked

name: is_dupe
description: Whether trial is duplicated in version 1 and 2. If so, both are marked as duplicates and can be filtered out in combination with `iv_version`.

name: has_german_umc_lead
description: Whether German UMC in trial `lead_cities` (sponsor, PI, or responsible party) or only in `facility_cities`. Version 2 includes only trials with German UMC lead.

name: lead_cities
description: City or names of lead German university medical centers based on `affiliation` in registries. Derived from `sponsors`, `overall officials`, and `responsible parties` from ClinicalTrials.gov, and any `addresses` from DRKS. Multiple UMCs (e.g., if study PI and sponsor organization have different affiliations) are separated by a single whitespace.
levels: Aachen; Berlin; Bochum; Bonn; Dresden; Duisburg; Düsseldorf; Erlangen; Frankfurt; Freiburg; Giessen; Göttingen; Greifswald; Halle; Hamburg; Hannover; Heidelberg; Homburg; Jena; Köln; Leipzig; LMU_München; Magdeburg; Mainz; Mannheim; Marburg; Münster; Regensburg; Rostock; Schleswig-Holstein; TU_München; Tübingen; Ulm; Witten-Herdecke; Würzburg

name: facility_cities
description: City or names of facility German university medical centers based on `affiliation` in registries. Derived from 'facilities' from ClinicalTrials.gov, and 'recruitmentLocation' from DRKS. Multiple UMCs (i.e., if one trial lists multiple facilities) are separated by a single whitespace. Only used in version 1; in version 2, all NA.
levels: Aachen; Berlin; Bochum; Bonn; Dresden; Duisburg; Düsseldorf; Erlangen; Frankfurt; Freiburg; Giessen; Göttingen; Greifswald; Halle; Hamburg; Hannover; Heidelberg; Homburg; Jena; Köln; Leipzig; LMU_München; Magdeburg; Mainz; Mannheim; Marburg; Münster; Regensburg; Rostock; Schleswig-Holstein; TU_München; Tübingen; Ulm; Witten-Herdecke; Würzburg

name: center_size
description: UMC classified as 'large' or 'small' depending on the number of trials led per `lead_cities`. A UMC was classified as 'large' if it conducted more trials than the median trial number per UMC across all UMCs included in the IntoValue1 or Intovalue2 studies, respectively. If trial has no German UMC lead, 'No lead center'.

name: main_sponsor
description: Whether main sponsor is industry or other, as given on registry. For ClinicalTrials.gov, sourced from `agency_class` in `sponsors` datatable , and `Other` includes NIH. For DRKS, sourced from `investigator initiated`.

name: intervention_type
description: Trial intervention, as given on registry. ClinicalTrials.gov only.
levels: Behavioral; Biological; Combination Product; Device; Diagnostic Test; Dietary Supplement; Drug; Genetic; Not given; Other; Procedure; Radiation

name: phase
description: Trial phase, as given on registry. Different levels for ClinicalTrials.gov and DRKS.
levels: Early Phase 1; I; I-II; II; II-III; IIa; IIb; III; IIIb; IV; Phase 1; Phase 1/Phase 2; Phase 2; Phase 2/Phase 3; Phase 3; Phase 4

name: enrollment
description: Number of trial participants, as given on registry. May be anticipated or actual number.

name: recruitment_status
description: Recruitment status, as given on registry. Different levels for ClinicalTrials.gov and DRKS.
levels: Active, not recruiting; Completed; Enrolling by invitation; Recruiting; Recruiting complete, follow-up complete; Recruiting stopped after recruiting started; Recruiting suspended on temporary hold; Suspended; Terminated; Unknown status; Withdrawn

name: masking
description: Trial masking, as given on registry. Different levels for ClinicalTrials.gov (Version 1: No masking, Open Label, Single Blind, Double Blind, Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor; Version 2: None (Open Label), Single, Double, Triple, Quadruple) and DRKS (Open (masking not used), Single blind, Blinded, Double or multiple blind).
levels: Blinded; Double; Double or multiple blind; None (Open Label); Open (masking not used); Quadruple; Single; Single blind; Triple

name: allocation
description: Trial allocation and randomization, as given on registry. Different levels for ClinicalTrials.gov and DRKS.
levels: Non-Randomized; Non-randomized controlled trial; Other; Randomized; Randomized controlled trial; Single arm study

name: is_randomized
description: Whether trial was randomized. Based on the 'allocation' variable. 'Randomized' or 'Randomized controlled trial' was counted as TRUE, while 'Non-Randomized, 'Non-randomized controlled trial', 'Other', and 'Single arm study' was counted as FALSE

name: is_multicentric
description: Whether multiple study centers are involved, as given on registry. Derived from `has_single_facility` (CT.gov) and `monoMultiCentric` (DRKS).

name: is_prospective
description: Whether trial was prospectively registered. Derived from `registration_date` and `start_date`. Trial is considered prospectively registered if registered in the same or previous months to start date.

name: has_summary_results
description: Whether summary results were posted on registry. ClinicalTrials.gov includes a structured summary results field. DRKS includes summary results with other references, and summary results were determined based on manual inspection with names such as Ergebnisbericht or Abschlussbericht.

name: registration_date
description: Date of study submission to registry, as given on registry.

name: start_date
description: Date of the study start, as given on registry. ClinicalTrials.gov previously allowed start dates without day, in which case date is defaulted to first of the month.

name: completion_date
description: Date of the study completion, as given on registry. ClinicalTrials.gov previously allowed completion dates without day, in which case date is defaulted to first of the month. Indicated as `study end date` on DRKS.

name: completion_year
description: Year of the study completion. Derived from `completion_date`.

name: primary_completion_date
description: Date of the study primary completion, as given on registry. ClinicalTrials.gov only. ClinicalTrials.gov previously allowed primary completion dates without day, in which case date is defaulted to first of the month.

name: primary_completion_year
description: Year of the study primary completion. Derived from `primary_completion_date`. ClinicalTrials.gov only.

name: summary_results_date
description: Date of summary results. For ClinicalTrials.gov only, date of submission to registry, derived from `results_first_submitted_date` (field previously called `first_received_results_date`). For DRKS, date included on posted summary result document.

name: days_cd_to_summary
description: Number of days from `completion_date` to `summary_results_date`. Derived. ClinicalTrials.gov only.

name: days_pcd_to_summary
description: Number of days from `primary_completion_date` to `summary_results_date`. Derived. ClinicalTrials.gov only.

name: days_reg_to_start
description: Number of days from `registration_date` to `start_date`. Derived.

name: days_reg_to_cd
description: Number of days from `registration_date` to `completion_date`. Derived.

name: days_reg_to_pcd
description: Number of days from `registration_date` to `primary_completion_date`. Derived. ClinicalTrials.gov only.

name: days_cd_to_publication
description: Number of days from `completion_date` to `publication_date`. Derived.

name: days_pcd_to_publication
description: Number of days from `primary_completion_date` to `publication_date`. Derived. ClinicalTrials.gov only.

name: days_reg_to_publication
description: Number of days from `registration_date` to `publication_date`. Derived.

name: doi
description: Publication DOI. Manually entered during publication search or derived from PMID via FatCat.

name: pmid
description: Publication PMID. Manually entered during publication search or derived from DOI via FatCat.

name: url
description: Publication URL. Manually entered during publication search.

name: publication_date
description: Publication date. Manually entered during publication search. Earliest date used, whether ePub or print pub date.

name: publication_type
description: Type of identified publication. Can be journal publication or dissertation.

name: licenses_required
levels: []; [{'type': 'cc-by-nc-nd', 'terms': ''}]; [{'type': 'cc-by-nc-nd'}]; [{'type': 'cc-by-nc-sa', 'terms': ''}]; [{'type': 'cc-by-nc', 'terms': ''}]; [{'type': 'cc-by-nc'}]; [{'type': 'cc-by', 'terms': ''}]; [{'type': 'cc-by'}]; [{'type': 'other (non-commercial)', 'terms': 'https://perma.cc/52DS-NZFF'}]; [{'type': 'other (non-commercial)', 'terms': 'https://perma.cc/6S5D-XMF4'}]; [{'type': 'other (non-commercial)'}]; [{'type': 'other-closed', 'terms': 'Personal use of this material is permitted.  Permission from IEEE must be obtained for all other uses'}]; [{'type': 'other-closed', 'terms': 'personal use only'}]; [{'type': 'other-closed', 'terms': 'personal use'}]; [{'type': 'other-closed'}]
